column1: This movie was absolutely fantastic! I loved every minute of it.
The food at this restaurant was terrible and the service was slow.
What a beautiful day to go for a walk in the park.
I'm so disappointed with this product. It broke after one day.
The customer service was excellent and very helpful.
This book was boring and I couldn't finish reading it.
Amazing experience at the concert last night!
The weather is really nice today.
I hate waiting in long lines at the store.
